ai_description: A roll of pink and white cleaning cloths featuring a distinctive wavy line pattern. The product is packaged in a plastic wrapper with a white, purple, blue, green, and orange label displaying brand and product information. Individual cloths are made of non-woven viscose rayon fabric and are neatly wound around a brown cardboard core. Lifestyle images show the cloth being used for wiping surfaces, held in a hand against backgrounds of kitchenware and bathroom sinks with yellow tulips.
